Jen will be gone for a week, and I'll be posting for Element and his
ship till she gets back. However, I'll be gone tomorrow for a camping
trip, and won't get back till 4pm on Wednesday.

::Element::

Element growls, watching Menasor place Firearm in Astroblast. He
fires four missiles in the air, mentally controlling them to fly in
circles above Astroblast.

"Give the Maximal back and I will let you leave in peace," Element
says to Astroblast, ready to direct the missiles to strike the
shuttle at any seconds.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: I forgot to respond about the four missiles.
>
> BIC:
> Menasor tried to whirl around, but only successfully dodged two
missiles. > The remainder struck him in the back with a sickening
explosione. He leaned > against Astroblast to gain his ballance. He
was considerably weaker now, > and furious, but he knew that now was
not the time for this anger. He put > what was left of Firearm inside
Astroblast, then with his free arm, grabbed > his burnt arm, trying
to ease the pain.
